resources.string:
<html>
			<head>
				<style>
					body
					{
						font-size: 12px;
						text-align: justify;
						color: #646464;
					}	

					table
					{
						font-size: 12px;
					}
					table th
					{
						padding: 4px 6px;
						text-align: center;
						background: #e3e3e3;
					}
					table td
					{	
						padding: 2px 4px;
						vertical-align: super;	
					}					
				</style>
			</head>
			<body>
